resources.string:
Siddharth Dhurka is a senior at UC Berkeley, pursuing simultaneous degrees in Business Administration and Economics. 
		He has been a part of Model UN since junior year of high school and has participated in over 20 conferences, both as a delegate and as a member of the organizing staff including his role as Deputy Secretary-General of UCBMUN 2012. 
		Born and brought up in Mumbai, India, he has a particular interest in the political affairs concerning the Indian subcontinent. 
		When he has time off from school and MUN, Sid likes to hang out with friends, go to the movies or watch European soccer, which is the one reason he doesnâ€™t mind waking up before noon. 
		He looks forward to meeting you all next spring in sunny California for an exhilarating UCBMUN 2013!
